Summary: was on corner of colfax and kippling stopped at a traffic light. looked to the ne past downtown and saw silver cloud cyclinder just hovering. thought was a cloud out of palce until i saw flashing lights . very random lights. was still hovering .
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There was one other sighting in Denver on or around May 23rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWas stopped at traffic light on colfax and kippling. Looked up to the ne in the horizon to the east of downtown saw hovering cloud. Kept staring at it because it looked out place, there was no other clouds in the area. Was white, almost transparent cylidrical in shape. After a few seconds of watching it i saw blue flashing lights and then red. Only lasted not even a second. It stayed hovering over the horizon,until i turned left onto kipling. i really wish i would have had my camera, not sure if an ipod would have taken a good picture. It was really cool and creepy at the same time. The guy in the car next to me seemed to see the same thing we both gave each other the pointed finger to the sky.
